Row.Text: I have sailed through treacherous waters and always emerged victorious.
Witness me, and see why my people accept me as leader.
Witness me, and see why my people accept me as leader.
Witness me, and see why my people accept me as leader.
Your mistakes brought you here. No second chance awaits.
I will not be trapped between an unforgiving sea and a tyrant.
Leave me with my citizens. I follow their fate.
I am pleased to see where your loyalties lie.
What factions favor you? Take this insult to them.
